alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 2:53AM CST until January 04 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 345 AM CST. * At 253 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Highway 9 and Highway 22 to Western Lake Martin to near Eclectic, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Tallassee, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Jacksons` Gap, Waverly, Reeves Airport, Southern Lake Martin, Eastern Lake Martin, Liberty City, Western Lake Martin, Tallapoosa City, Northern Lake Martin, Wind Creek State Park, Still Waters Resort, Daviston, Dare Park, Horseshoe Bend, Susannah Crossing and Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
